message.name: ERR_FV_DATE_OF_VISIT_FIELD_EMPTY
message.locale: A Date of Visit must be entered.

message.name: ERR_FV_FINDINGS_EXCEEDS_MAX_LENGTH
message.locale: The length of the home visit findings must not exceed %1n characters.

message.name: ERR_XRV_DATE_OF_VISIT_BEFORE_HOME_STUDY_INITIATED_DATE
message.locale: The Date of Visit, %1d, must be on or after the home study Date Initiated, %2d.

message.name: ERR_XRV_CANNOT_UPDATE_IF_HOME_STUDY_APPROVED_MODIFY
message.locale: The home study is '%1c', the home visit cannot be modified.

message.name: ERR_XRV_CANNOT_UPDATE_IF_HOME_STUDY_APPROVED_INSERT
message.locale: The home study is '%1c', a home visit cannot be added.

message.name: ERR_XRV_CANNOT_UPDATE_IF_HOME_STUDY_APPROVED_CANCEL
message.locale: The home study is '%1c', the home visit cannot be deleted.

message.name: ERR_HOMESTUDYHOMEVISIT_XRV_HOMESTUDY_CANCELLED_CANNOT_ADD_HOMESTUDYHOMEVISIT
message.locale: The home study is '%1c', a home visit cannot be added.
